languages.text: "Благодарю, паломни{mf|к|ца}. Сие было непросто — наблюдать, как нечестивцы топчут чертоги моего храма. Все мы желали бы участи наших братьев, павших прежде, чем случилось сие богохульство".
"Thank you, pilgrim. It was not easy, watching unholy intruders stampede through the chambers of my temple. We all envied our brethren who had fallen before that sacrilege began."
languages.original_text: "Благодарю, паломни{mf|к|ца}. Сие было непросто — наблюдать, как нечестивцы топчут чертоги моего храма. Все мы желали бы участи наших братьев, павших прежде, чем случилось сие богохульство".

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, pilgrim. It was not easy, watching unholy intruders stampede through the chambers of my temple. We all envied our brethren who had fallen before that sacrilege began."
"Thank you, pilgrim. It was not easy, watching unholy intruders stampede through the chambers of my temple. We all envied our brethren who had fallen before that sacrilege began."
"Thank you, pilgrim. It was not easy, watching unholy intruders stampede through the chambers of my temple. We all envied our brethren who had fallen before that sacrilege began."
"Thank you, pilgrim. It was not easy, watching unholy intruders stampede through the chambers of my temple. We all envied our brethren who had fallen before that sacrilege began."
"Thank you, pilgrim. It was not easy, watching unholy intruders stampede through the chambers of my temple. We all envied our brethren who had fallen before that sacrilege began."
"Thank you, pilgrim. It was not easy, watching unholy intruders stampede through the chambers of my temple. We all envied our brethren who had fallen before that sacrilege began."

languages.text: "Danke, {mf|Pilger|Pilgerin}. Es war nicht leicht, mitanzusehen, wie unheilige Eindringlinge durch die Kammern meines Tempels trampeln. Wir alle haben unsere Brüder beneidet, die vor Beginn dieses Sakrilegs gefallen waren."
languages.original_text: "Thank you, pilgrim. It was not easy, watching unholy intruders stampede through the chambers of my temple. We all envied our brethren who had fallen before that sacrilege began."

traits.locale_text: "Danke, {mf|Pilger|Pilgerin}. Es war nicht leicht, mitanzusehen, wie unheilige Eindringlinge durch die Kammern meines Tempels trampeln. Wir alle haben unsere Brüder beneidet, die vor Beginn dieses Sakrilegs gefallen waren."

languages.text: « Merci, {mf|pèlerin|pèlerine}. Ce fut... difficile, de voir ces impies fouler les salles de mon temple... Nous étions envieux de nos frères qui étaient tombés et n'avaient pu contempler cet atroce sacrilège. »
languages.original_text: "Thank you, pilgrim. It was not easy, watching unholy intruders stampede through the chambers of my temple. We all envied our brethren who had fallen before that sacrilege began."

traits.locale_text: « Merci, {mf|pèlerin|pèlerine}. Ce fut... difficile, de voir ces impies fouler les salles de mon temple... Nous étions envieux de nos frères qui étaient tombés et n'avaient pu contempler cet atroce sacrilège. »

languages.text: “谢谢你，朝圣者。亲眼看着那些邪恶的入侵者在神殿的房间里乱窜，这实在令人难过不已。我们所有人都很羡慕在这场亵渎爆发之前就死去的兄弟们。”
languages.original_text: "Thank you, pilgrim. It was not easy, watching unholy intruders stampede through the chambers of my temple. We all envied our brethren who had fallen before that sacrilege began."

traits.locale_text: “谢谢你，朝圣者。亲眼看着那些邪恶的入侵者在神殿的房间里乱窜，这实在令人难过不已。我们所有人都很羡慕在这场亵渎爆发之前就死去的兄弟们。”

languages.text: 「ありがとう、巡礼者よ。不浄なる侵入者たちが私の神殿の部屋を踏み荒らしていくのを見るのは、耐え難いことだった。我々は皆、その冒涜が始まるより前に倒れた兄弟たちを羨んですらいたほどだ」
languages.original_text: "Thank you, pilgrim. It was not easy, watching unholy intruders stampede through the chambers of my temple. We all envied our brethren who had fallen before that sacrilege began."

traits.locale_text: 「ありがとう、巡礼者よ。不浄なる侵入者たちが私の神殿の部屋を踏み荒らしていくのを見るのは、耐え難いことだった。我々は皆、その冒涜が始まるより前に倒れた兄弟たちを羨んですらいたほどだ」

languages.text: «Gracias, peregrino. No fue fácil ver intrusos impíos atravesar en estampida las cámaras de mi templo. Todos envidiábamos a los hermanos que habían caído antes de que empezara ese sacrilegio».
languages.original_text: "Thank you, pilgrim. It was not easy, watching unholy intruders stampede through the chambers of my temple. We all envied our brethren who had fallen before that sacrilege began."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias, peregrino. No fue fácil ver intrusos impíos atravesar en estampida las cámaras de mi templo. Todos envidiábamos a los hermanos que habían caído antes de que empezara ese sacrilegio».

languages.text: "Sağ olasın hacı. Dinsiz istilacıların tapınağımın odalarında çılgınca koşuşturmasını izlemek kolay değildi. Kutsalımız ayaklar altına alınmadan evvel ölen yoldaşlarımıza hepimiz gıpta ettik."
languages.original_text: "Thank you, pilgrim. It was not easy, watching unholy intruders stampede through the chambers of my temple. We all envied our brethren who had fallen before that sacrilege began."

traits.locale_text: "Sağ olasın seyyah. Dinsiz istilacıların tapınağımın odalarında çılgınca koşuşturmasını izlemek kolay değildi. Kutsalımızın ayaklar altına alınmadan önce ölen yoldaşlarımıza hepimiz gıpta ettik."
